front.title: Transferring MIB Work from IETF Bridge MIB WG to IEEE 802.1 WG

abstract.t: This document describes the plan to transition responsibility for bridging-related MIB modules from the IETF Bridge MIB Working Group to the IEEE 802.1 Working Group, which develops the bridging technology the MIB modules are designed to manage. This memo provides information for the Internet community.
